  • Big Step Forward
    February 20, 2015
    Published in Personal
    0 Comments

    I have officially been coding for 2yrs, which in itself, is crazy to think. I moved to Chicago after graduating college with a BFA in Applied Media Arts, which is just a fancy catch-all title for a crazy blend of animation, traditional art, art history, and graphic design. I left with the toolset need to be an intern at a tiny print shop in cold, deserted land of Northwestern Pennsylvania. In hopes that the bigger city would present opportunities for bigger jobs...
